about_the_game:
Elon Tycoon is the best economic strategy game to become the greatest industrial magnate! You are presented with is an unique opportunity to manage large industrial enterprises, to go from a self-employment to the industry leader! Inspired by real story. :-)

💰Hire Employees
Hire and manage employees to increase your money income. Every employee has a special tycoon effect. Get a glimpse of the story of their lives by reading cool and funny messages from employees either thinking or talking.

💰Run Operations & Earn Passive Income
As a businessman you have to buy computers, machines, mobiles for testing games, get internet etc. Get whatever it takes to keep the company going and earn benefits in the form of passive income.

💰Build Factories
Buy machines, hire employees and start production. Do research and upgrade your equipment. Expand your factory by building new facilities. The success of your enterprise depends on the strategy you choose!

💰Customize Your Office
You can re-arrange and move everything from employees to office tables, computer desks, machines and all kinds of props that you unlock in the game, very easy to customize your own office and factory the way you want!

Run a realistic game business simulator and make some cool cash inspired by the perfect Elon tycoon story!

💰💰💰FEATURES

💰 Best business simulator for magnates to build empires
💰 Go from self-employment in garage to riches, work your way up to trillionaire status and beyond!
💰 Spend your money wisely, certain investments can be more efficient than others
💰 The decisions you make during game development really matter. Decide which areas you want to focus on while building your empire.
💰 Research new technologies.
💰 Conduct industry changing projects.
💰 Hire employees and increase their skills
💰 Build factories and buy machines
💰 Research and upgrade your equipment
💰 Make big bucks and fly to the Moon or Mars

Manage, build and dominate as the biggest boss! Start your empire today!
detailed_description:
CHECK OUT MORE GAMES FROM OUR FRIENDS




About the Game




Elon Tycoon is the best economic strategy game to become the greatest industrial magnate! You are presented with is an unique opportunity to manage large industrial enterprises, to go from a self-employment to the industry leader! Inspired by real story. :-)

💰Hire Employees
Hire and manage employees to increase your money income. Every employee has a special tycoon effect. Get a glimpse of the story of their lives by reading cool and funny messages from employees either thinking or talking.

💰Run Operations & Earn Passive Income
As a businessman you have to buy computers, machines, mobiles for testing games, get internet etc. Get whatever it takes to keep the company going and earn benefits in the form of passive income.

💰Build Factories
Buy machines, hire employees and start production. Do research and upgrade your equipment. Expand your factory by building new facilities. The success of your enterprise depends on the strategy you choose!

💰Customize Your Office
You can re-arrange and move everything from employees to office tables, computer desks, machines and all kinds of props that you unlock in the game, very easy to customize your own office and factory the way you want!

Run a realistic game business simulator and make some cool cash inspired by the perfect Elon tycoon story!

💰💰💰FEATURES

💰 Best business simulator for magnates to build empires
💰 Go from self-employment in garage to riches, work your way up to trillionaire status and beyond!
💰 Spend your money wisely, certain investments can be more efficient than others
💰 The decisions you make during game development really matter. Decide which areas you want to focus on while building your empire.
💰 Research new technologies.
💰 Conduct industry changing projects.
💰 Hire employees and increase their skills
💰 Build factories and buy machines
💰 Research and upgrade your equipment
💰 Make big bucks and fly to the Moon or Mars

Manage, build and dominate as the biggest boss! Start your empire today!
name: Elon Tycoon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti / Intel HD 620
  • DirectX: Version 9.0b
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD FX-8320 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Elon Tycoon is the best economic strategy game to become the greatest industrial magnate💰 Go from a self-employment in the garage to the industry leader in the world💰 Manage, build and dominate - start your empire today💰💰💰
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
